title: Ted Bishop's Excellent Misadventures as PGA of America President
headline: Ted Bishop's Excellent Misadventures as PGA of America President
description: PGA President Ted Bishop was ousted from his post two months before the end of his term after calling Ian Poulter a 'lil girl' on Twitter. Here's a look back at some of the most memorable moments from his presidency.
short_headline: Ted Bishop's Excellent Misadventures as PGA of America President
page_title: Ted Bishop's Excellent Misadventures as PGA of America President
slug: Ted Bishop's Excellent Misadventures as PGA of America President
body: PGA President Ted Bishop was ousted from his post two months before the end of his term after calling Ian Poulter a 'lil girl' on Twitter. Here's a look back at some of the most memorable moments from his presidency.
